info.name: Netflix Color Plus
info.description: I will no longer be supporting this style here. if you'd like to you can install my new Netflix Color Plus Add-on/extension for Google Chrome or Mozilla Firefox below: Netflix Color Plus for Google Chrome Netflix Color Plus for Mozilla Firefox Additionally If you would like to help me out, you can Buy me a coffee! :)
info.additionalInfo:
2020/04/13:
 • Fixed "PROFILE & PARENTAL CONTROLS" on Account Settings Page.

2020/04/01:
 • Colored: Replay Button.

2020/03/29:
 • Fixed Facebook Login Button.
 • Added Option: Colored Player Gradient Overlay (Reduced Opacity).
 • Added Option: Black Background.
 • Added Option: Dark Account Settings.
 • Added Color: Pink.
 • Added Color: Hot Pink.
 • Minor Fixes.

2020/03/07:
 • Fixed "Watch Credits" and "Next Episode" buttons.
 • Colored: Notifications Carrot and Top Border.
 • Colored: Search Box Border.
 • Colored: X Button On Search Box.
 • Colored: Account Menu Borders.

2020/03/06:
 • Fixed top area after selecting TV Shows or Movies when billboard is hidden.

2020/01/15:
 • Minor Fix.

2020/01/07:
 • Added Option: Colored Player Gradient Overlay.
 • Added Option: Hide Player Gradient Overlay.
 • Fixed My List Button.
 • Fixed Next Episode Button.
 • Fixed Report A Problem Window.

2020/01/06:
 • Fixed Login Button.
 • Updated Cover Image.
 • Changed Info.

2019/12/19:
 • Fixed "My List" Button.

2019/12/07:
 • Minor Fix.

2019/11/14:
 • Added New Gifts Icon to Colored Icons.

2019/08/07:
 • Added Info to Description (Please Read!)

2019/03/21:
 • Colored: Notification Pill.

2019/03/11:
 • Added Color: Red (Default).
 • Added Color: Orange.
 • Added Color: Green.
 • Added Color: Brown.

2019/01/30:
 • Colored: Loading Spinner.

2019/01/28:
 • Added Option: Enable or Disable Round Profile Icons.
 • Fixed Missing Border Colors.

2019/01/27:
 • Colored: Slider Icon.

2019/01/25:
 • Added Option: Visible Pagination Indicator.
 • Added Option: Billboard (Top Promotion).

2019/01/24:
 • Initial Release.
